rows.label: qst703303_msg0001
rows.name:
Thank you for that! I'm sorry you
had to go to all that trouble for me.

rows.label: qst703303_msg0002
rows.name:
Phew-wee. Now that's settled,
I can finally leave.

rows.label: qst703303_msg0003
rows.name: I have to ask: what exactly happened?

rows.label: qst703303_msg0004
rows.name:
Ahem. Well, Shin..
When you've lived as long as I have...

rows.label: qst703303_msg0005
rows.name:
There are bound to be one or two
matters you find it...indelicate to
talk about...

rows.label: qst703303_msg0006
rows.name: Women.

rows.label: qst703303_msg0007
rows.name:
Now just wait a moment! How dare you
assume like that, young man!

rows.label: qst703303_msg0008
rows.name: Now Minochi, don't pry.

rows.label: qst703303_msg0009
rows.name:
The Divine Beast doth protest too much,
methinks. I'd say I hit the bullseye.

rows.label: qst703303_msg0010
rows.name:
Is there a special someone in your
heart, Seiryu?

rows.label: qst703303_msg0011
rows.name:
Hey, so, while we're chatting, someone
mentioned something about a fabulous
hoard of money. What's that about?

rows.label: qst703303_msg0012
rows.name:
Oops, just remembered I have
somewhere to be!

rows.label: qst703303_msg0013
rows.name:
I have to go and meet Tarath.
OK, toodle pip!

rows.label: qst703303_msg0014
rows.name: Bye, Nuncle!

rows.label: qst703303_msg0015
rows.name:
He's hiding something for sure.
Should we find out what it is?

rows.label: qst703303_msg0016
rows.name:
I'm sure it's very complicated,
whatever it is. Perhaps we should
just trust that he has it under control.

rows.label: qst703303_msg0017
rows.name:
When I look at Nuncle, I think that
maybe people and Divine Beasts aren't so very
different after all. Blades too, of course!

rows.label: qst703303_msg0018
rows.name:
There's no reason we shouldn't
all get along.

rows.label: qst703303_msg0019
rows.name: I agree.

rows.label: qst703303_msg0020
rows.name: That's a very positive outlook.

rows.label: qst703303_msg0021
rows.name:
When I look around at you guys,
I can't help but believe it.
